You can build your own battlescene here, using one of the slots provided below and game Edit mode  (you need to switch edit mode ON in M&B lauching screen Options first).  You can then submit scenes you constructed (namely, sco files from TLD/SceneObj folder)  to the dev team of TLD, and if your scene is good,  it can appear in later releases as one of random battlegrounds!^^ Try to specify which region on map you want your scene to appear.^ Couple hints: avoid deep water, steep mountains and other impassable places,  unless you are experienced scene-maker and know how to bar AI troops  from walking where you don't want them, and make AI mesh in other places.^ (Entries #0-1 are for attackers, #4 for defenders, do not touch #5-8
